categories: Category:Battles of the operations on Tatooine

nodes.text: Bombing of the Imperial Listening Station

After a three-sided race on Tatooine that cumulated in an Alliance success on retrieving a crashed freighter carrying vital supplies, an Alliance campaign intending to oust the Galactic Empire from the planet was instigated, thus leading to a bombing of the Imperial Listening Station by Saponza's Gang as a prelude to the Battle for Tatooine.
